metadata.title: CVE-2024-38312 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When browsing private tabs, some data related to location history orwebpage thumbnails could be persisted incorrectly within the sandboxed appbundle after app termination This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS <127.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
